mapper.select: SELECT a.applicationNum, a.applicationName, a.companyId, a.workingArea, a.career, a.education, a.employmentType, a.salary, a.roleId, DATE_FORMAT(deadlineDate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS deadlineDate, CASE WHEN b.bookmarkNum IS NOT NULL THEN 1 -- 북마크된 상태 ELSE 0 -- 북마크되지 않은 상태 END AS isBookmarked FROM applications a LEFT JOIN usertoapplicationbookmarks b ON a.applicationNum = b.applicationNum AND b.userId = #{userId};
